title: The game client isnt working?
body: SO, im able to do everything in the client..Except play the game when im supposed to be in the waiting lobby while we are loading into the game it stops working all of a sudden. Any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
It's a little hard to understand exactly what's going on with your client, but you did mention that when you're loading into the game it stops working. Typically those loading screen issues happen if your network isn't able to reliably communicate with the game server you were going to play one. 

Without much more information it's hard to troubleshoot, but my first suggestion would be to check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there.
